definitions.definition: A piece, such as a ring or hook, attached to another piece by a pin, in such a manner as to permit rotation about the pin as an axis.
A small piece of ordnance , turning on a point or swivel; called also swivel gun.
Strength of mind or character that enables one to overcome adversity; confidence; force of will.
A small, usually ball- or barrel-shaped device used in angling to connect sections of fishing lines, consisting of two rings linked via a thrust bearing pivot joint.

main_definition: ( mechanical ) A piece, such as a ring or hook, attached to another piece by a pin, in such a manner as to permit rotation about the pin as an axis.
secondary_definitions: ( military ) A small piece of ordnance , turning on a point or swivel; called also swivel gun.
( slang , uncountable ) Strength of mind or character that enables one to overcome adversity; confidence; force of will.
( dance ) A rotating of the hips.
( fishing ) A small, usually ball- or barrel-shaped device used in angling to connect sections of fishing lines, consisting of two rings linked via a thrust bearing pivot joint.
